short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension app allows users to effortlessly save and edit text snippets directly within their browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save something you need to copy and paste often!
Texts will be stored on your browser local storage, 
so delete texts if you are using a public computer.
